description:
Just as Yasaka and Fei-Yan`s battle is about to end, a single tank rolls up. From inside the tank, Kenshiro emerges! In order to save his pengyou Fei-Yan, he charged through a Shanghai burning with the flames of war.
"You got a problem with the North Star?"
The battle between West Dipper Lunar Fist user Yasaka driven by the will of the Yuezhi god and Kenshiro begins now!!
Meanwhile, Erika waits at the church where the swallow`s chicks are crying for Fei-Yan to return. As Erika gazes up at the nest, the chicks fly off into the great blue sky one by one.
Source: crunchyroll
